summary: Email correspondence regarding a subpoena for records related to Maxwell from Expedia. The email chain indicates Expedia received a subpoena on February 1, 2020, but requires additional identifying information (email addresses, credit card numbers, or itinerary numbers) to locate responsive records, as their databases lack date of birth information to positively identify customers by name alone.

Michelle is communicating with SAM regarding the subpoena request for Maxwell's records.

events.description: Expedia received a subpoena related to Maxwell.

events.title: Expedia requests more information
events.description: Expedia emails SAM stating they need more identifying information (email, credit card, itinerary numbers) to locate records for Maxwell, as their databases lack DOB info.

events.title: Email forwarded
events.description: The email chain regarding the subpoena is forwarded.

keyFacts: A subpoena was issued to Expedia for records related to Maxwell, received on February 1, 2020.

Expedia's databases do not contain date of birth information, so they cannot positively identify customers by name alone; they require email addresses, credit card numbers, or itinerary numbers to locate responsive records.
Expedia set a 30-day deadline for receiving additional information, after which they would consider the matter closed.
